name: Google Drive Dark Theme [V1.0.2]
description: Browse your files in the dark with this style! I also have other dark themes for Google products, please check them out: Dark Theme for Google Docs (includes Google Drive & more) Google Search Dark Theme Google Translate Dark Theme Google Classroom Dark Theme Google Calendar Dark Theme

user.name: Lekrkoekj
user.about:
Hi I'm Lekrkoekj! 
I mostly make Dark Themes for a lot of sites on here. If you like any of my styles,  be sure to give feedback on them.

additional_info:
Version 1.0.2
The profile chooser is dark again.
The top bar is dark again.

Version 1.0.1
The profile chooser is dark again.
The top bar looks normal again.
The search bar is dark again.
Folder names in the top bar are white again.

Version 1.0
Initial release.
